comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: I would guess it's <u>Tonga</u> woman, not 'Touga'

comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: A historic picture of a Gwembwe Valley Tonga woman just before the area and its people were evacuated to make way for the Kariba Dam.

comment.author: 59500469@N08
comment._content: I confirm Alistair Scott's comment.  This was taken at the western end of the Gwembe Valley by Nigel Watt, N.R. Govt. photographer in 1950.   There is a substantial collection of Watt's Gwembe photos in the Zambian Govt Archives.   The content of this particular photo is described in Material Culture of the Peoples of the Gwembe Valley, Manch Univ Press, 1968.  by Barrie Reynolds.
